Our Services

Our services are broadly categorized into three core areas.

Business Consulting

Mapping your business objectives to programs, deriving project needs/tuning existing projects to deliver outcomes, measuring & monitoring outcomes, incorporating strategies to boost ROI and optimize spend.

Technology/Delivery Services

Receive end-to-end platform/software development services across all phases of SDLC - Requirements Gathering, Design & Architecture, Coding, Quality Control, Release Management, Maintenance & Support packaged in the delivery model best suited for you.

Workforce as a Service

Empower yourself with a new team or augment staff to your existing team with the unique skillset needs that you desire. Engage and disengage with flexible models that suit you the best; you set the expectations, and the workforce will deliver.

Technology Stack

Our services cater to the following tech stack we support.

Salesforce CRM

Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Experience Cloud, Analytics Cloud, Platform Shield, App Cloud, Mulesoft

Python Full Stack

Python Automation, FastAPI Development, Django Web Development, Data Analytics using Pandas + Jupyter

Core Web Stack

HTML/CSS/JavaScript, JQuery, NodeJS Backend, React Framework, NextJS Framework, Tailwind CSS, Bulma CSS, Jekyll Websites
